org.anarres.gradle.plugin.velocity

Class VelocityPluginExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.gradle.plugin.velocity.VelocityPluginExtension

  • public class VelocityPluginExtension
extends Object
    The velocity plugin extension. This allows configuring the velocity plugin using a velocity { } block.
